messages.subject: RE: [unschoolingbasics] Hannah's passing
messages.msgSnippet: Oh, gosh... I am so sorry. My son and I made a whole alter to her and her family today, we will change it to reflect her passing and energy to her family to
messages.messageBody:
Oh, gosh... I am so sorry. My son and I made a whole alter to her and her
family today, we will change it to reflect her passing and energy to her
family to support then through this very difficult time.

Shannon
Melaleuca Customer

Join our club and swap paperback books for FREE - PaperBackSwap.com

-----Original Message-----
From: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
[mailto:unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of Ren Allen
Sent: Friday, February 24, 2006 8:54 AM
To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [unschoolingbasics] Hannah's passing

Dear friends,

Kelli called Rue this morning, to distraught to talk much, but let her
know that Hannah passed away around 2am this morning. Her poor little
body just couldn't handle any more.

I am at a loss for words right now. Please take some time to send
your love to the Jenner family, in thought or words. Thank you.

Ren
learninginfreedom.com

Jann and Danielle

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Re: Hannah's passing
messages.msgSnippet: Our thoughts and prayers are with Hanna and her family. Im gathering as much positive energy as I can and sending their way. Nicole ... Brings words and photos
messages.messageBody:
Our thoughts and prayers are with Hanna and her family. Im gathering as much positive energy as I can and sending their way.

Nicole

messages.subject: Re: Hannah's passing
messages.msgSnippet: I came here first thing this mornihg to see if there were any updates. I was hoping for something different. :-( ~ Joanne ~ Mom to Jacqueline (7), Shawna (10)
messages.messageBody:
I came here first thing this mornihg to see if there were any updates.
I was hoping for something different. :-(

~ Joanne ~
Mom to Jacqueline (7), Shawna (10) & Cimion (13)
Adopted into our hearts October 30, 2003
http://anunschoolinglife.blogspot.com/
